bug.short_desc: Limitations of fields in table model if it is not a column

long_desc.thetext:
Hi,
In a row table, when you insert row(s), you can want to keep original map even if you do not want to have each field as a column (see http://demo.qooxdoo.org/current/apiviewer/#qx.ui.table.model.Simple~addRowsAsMapArray!method_public param "rememberMaps"). It's very important to keep, for example, some technical data in memory but without display them (e.g IDs, DB primary keys, ....). But some methods only works if the specified field is a column, e.g getValueById (see http://demo.qooxdoo.org/current/apiviewer/#qx.ui.table.ITableModel~getValueById!method_public first param is a columnId so cannot work with other columns). To understand better the problem, see this thread : http://qooxdoo.678.n2.nabble.com/Filter-table-rows-by-invisible-field-td7586184.html#a7586187 Of course, I just need to derive the model class and override methods but I think It's interesting to open bug report for that
